item.title: About
item.description: You can find me on all the usual places on social media. Specifically I'm: @patrickod on Twitter @patrickod on Github @patrickod on Soundcloud (empty but watch this space!) @podoherty on Instagram patrick_o_d on Flickr Getting in touch If any of the above methods don't reach me you can always drop a note to hello@patrickod.com to get in touch.
